select B.* FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (
buyer_NAME like '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
buyer_ADD1 like '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
buyer_NAME like '%'||#{searchWord}||'%' OR buyer_ADD1 like '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
ORDER BY ROWID DESC) A )B
WHERE RNUM>=#{startRow} AND RNUM<=#{endRow}
mapper.update: update buyer set BUYER_NAME=#{buyer_name}, BUYER_BANK=#{buyer_bank}, BUYER_BANKNO=#{buyer_bankno}, BUYER_BANKNAME=#{buyer_bankname}, BUYER_ZIP=#{buyer_zip}, BUYER_ADD1=#{buyer_add1}, BUYER_ADD2=#{buyer_add2}, BUYER_COMTEL=#{buyer_comtel}, BUYER_FAX=#{buyer_fax}, BUYER_MAIL=#{buyer_mail}, BUYER_CHARGER=#{buyer_charger} where BUYER_ID=#{buyer_id}
mapper.delete: UPDATE BUYER SET BUYER_DELETE='Y' where BUYER_ID=#{asd}
